name: Duck Duck TOAST
description:
You've made your list, and you've checked it twice! Duck Duck TOAST is a 2D side-scrolling platformer about delivering jam and toast gifts to ducklings who have been nice this year. Play as Santa Duck, who must find the right recipe for each duckling before it's too late!

Made in 48 hours for UCLA ACM Studio's 2021 Snowjam.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • Space bar to interact.
  • Enter key to advance dialogue.
  • Escape key to open settings.

Credits:

  • Programming: Richard Cheng, Austin Law, Conway Xu, Ashley Lu
  • Art: Emily Pitcher, Julia Lee, Caroline Wang, Isabelle Szeto
  • Level Design: Arnav Saud
  • Writing: Emily Pitcher, Arnav Saud
  • Music: Emily Pitcher
  • SFX: Emily Pitcher, Arnav Saud
  • UI Design: Caroline Wang
